| HistoryText             = The Ghost Rider Assassination League{{r|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A-Z Update Vol 1 3|; [[Orb (Mercenary) (Earth-616)|Orb]]'s entry}}{{r|Heroic Age: Villains Vol 1 1|; [[Deacon (Earth-616)|Deacon]], [[Orb (Mercenary) (Earth-616)|Orb]], and [[Ebenezer Laughton (Earth-616)|Scarecrow]]'s entries}} was a group of villains gathered by [[Blackout (Lilin) (Earth-616)|Blackout]] at [[Zadkiel (Earth-616)|Zadkiel]]'s behest to kill the Ghost Riders [[Johnathon Blaze (Earth-616)|Johnny Blaze]] and [[Daniel Ketch (Earth-616)|Daniel Ketch]].{{r|Ghost Riders: Heaven's on Fire Vol 1 1|2}} It came to an end after they failed to prevent Zadkiel's defeat by the hands of the Ghost Riders.{{r|Ghost Riders: Heaven's on Fire Vol 1 5}}
